english.segment1: Are you hear to stay?. Why should I ask?. The water is warm my friend. This one should last. Landmarks that define. no longer align with the direction we're heading. It's the consequence I fear. when you label me like that. I guess I wish you'd take some time with me. The words I spoke were clear. Some people only hear what they want to hear to make them feel alright.
english.segment2: Landmarks that define. no longer align with the direction we're heading. Landmarks that define. no longer align with the song we're singing.
english.segment3: Fear it's how you feel. It's the way you feel that keeps you from the truth.
